title: True Food Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant chain with a menu centered on the principals of Dr. Andrew Weil's Anti-Inflammatory Diet & Food Pyramid, with several ovo/lacto vegetarian dishes and a few vegan ones, marked. Uses local, farm to table and organic ingredients when possible; all food is made-in-house from scratch. Offers gluten free alternatives. A fresh, lively, contemporary, positive atmosphere with an open kitchen and knowledgeable staff.
